Author: Quesokinesis
Text: it's scientifically impossible for you to have the grodiest flesh prison?? I'm wearing it like a moldy bedsheet right mothrfkn now  but for real, this is a good step. thinspo is creepy trash and if you have a distorted body image, you could even end up envying someone who weighs *more* than you. there's no winning.  idk if this is an option for you, but only having face-level mirrors helps me keep my shit together too.
